snippet: Paralyzed because of a building crane across the street left dangling by the storm, the hall rescheduled some concerts and moved others to new locations.
abstract: Paralyzed because of a building crane across the street left dangling by the storm, the hall rescheduled some concerts and moved others to new locations.

headline.main: Carnegie Hall Scrambles to Reschedule Canceled Concerts
headline.print_headline: Carnegie Hall Scrambles To Reschedule Concerts
